creditline: Gift of Joanne Leonard in memory and honor of Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg, and in honor of her daughter, Jane C. Ginsburg, and Joanne's daughter, Julia M. Leonard
description: black and white image of a push-button wall telephone with a calendar hanging below it; plaque to left with text: "My House Is Clean Enough To be Healthy, And Dirty Enough To Be Happy"; light switch with daisy motif switch plate below; polka dotted curtain to right
portfolio: From Human Arts and Technology series
signed: LL below image on mat in pencil: Memo Center and Daisies | LR below image on mat in pencil: Joanne Leonard 78/80
title: Memo Center with Clean House Plaque, CA
